room_title: Escape room "Bank Heist" by Escape Room Palm Springs in Palm Springs
review: My girlfriends and I completed Bank Heist Escape Room in Palm Springs. It was an amazing experience. Dominique and Emily were great and help us giving  hints. We will be back again to experience other rooms. It's sooooo much fun. We highly recommend Palm Springs Escape Room.

room_title: Escape room "Bank Heist" by Escape Room Palm Springs in Palm Springs
review: Our first time doing an escape room. Took our 2 kids (age 10 and 13) and the entire family had a great time. We did the bank heist room which was quite challenging, but we received a lot of helpful hints form Eevee. She was very supportive and gave us just enough clues to “break the vault” with 4 minutes remaining.  We would definitely recommend the escape room here and hope to return in the near future.

room_title: Escape room "Bank Heist" by Escape Room Palm Springs in Palm Springs
review: The Bank Heist escape room was a lot of fun! Our game guide, Ty, kept us on track and was great with the family. We had a great time and will definitely be heading back. Thanks for the fun!

room_title: Escape room "Bank Heist" by Escape Room Palm Springs in Palm Springs
review: Have already tried two rooms here. Merlin's room is tech-friendly while the Bank Heist is keys and locks. Both rooms were fun but we absolutely LOVED robbing a bank!The staff and owner are so friendly and helpful! Plus you can't beat the price. Highly recommend

room_title: Escape room "Bank Heist" by Escape Room Palm Springs in Palm Springs
review: My group and I had the best time ever here. We did the Bank heist and it truly tested our mental abilities. Dominique deserves our highest graces for getting us in so quickly. Your customer service made my group feel so welcomed. Thank you for a great time!
